subject: College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Fifth-ranked Florida may be without receiver Percy Harvin and middle linebacker Brandon Spikes for its opener against Hawaii on Saturday. Harvin, still battling a right heel injury that required off-season surgery, participated in portions of practice Friday and Saturday, but said he had been unable to go full speed. Coach Urban Meyer announced Monday that Spikes injured his right foot during practice last week.
